headline: Allstate to Hold Q1 2025 Earnings Call May 1
summary: NORTHBROOK, Ill., March 31, 2025--The Allstate Corporation (NYSE: ALL) will host a conference call and webcast at 9 a.m. ET on Thursday, May 1, 2025, to discuss first-quarter 2025 financial results.

headline: Allstate Rides on Property Liability Growth & Streamlining Initiatives
summary: ALL benefits from rising segmental revenues, cost control and streamlining initiatives.
